about_the_game: Get a feel for Tetradecagon with this demo. Only includes the square level, although you can play for an infinite amount of time. Upgrade to the full version for unlimited, steam integrated gameplay.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Gameplay that gives a greater sense for what the full game is like.
  • One difficulty (square)
  • 1 kickass chiptune soundtrack made by Valiant
  • The best game of ping pong you will ever play in your life
  • Full controller support (you can play on your couch!)
  • Support for Windows, Mac, and Linux + SteamOS


About the Demo

Get a feel for Tetradecagon with this demo. Only includes the square level, although you can play for an infinite amount of time. Upgrade to the full version for unlimited, steam integrated gameplay.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS or equivalent
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Sound Card: OpenAL 2.0.7.0 Support
  • Additional Notes: libopenal1 may be needed to be installed separately for sound support.
